plot: About a young man, who through a course of losing his father, learns a secret about his true biological make-up. Struggling to assimilate to a new culture, he believes he needs to re-invent himself.
title: Pocho
plot_es: About a young man, who through a course of losing his father, learns a secret about his true biological make-up. Struggling to assimilate to a new culture, he believes he needs to re-invent himself.
plot_en: About a young man, who through a course of losing his father, learns a secret about his true biological make-up. Struggling to assimilate to a new culture, he believes he needs to re-invent himself.
